                            [ G a m e   N o t e s ]

  Leave the nonmagical world behind and enroll in Hogwarts School of
  Witchcraft and Wizardry in Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone for
  the PC. Be Harry Potter, wizard-in-training, learning to master all things
  magical in a world filled with adventure, fun, and danger. Encounter
  breathtaking challenges and unforgettable characters from J.K. Rowling's
  worldwide bestseller.  
                         
  Players take the role of Harry Potter as he enrolls in Hogwarts and
  embarks on a journey to unlock the secrets of his own magical abilities.
  Along the way, Harry will explore the halls of Hogwarts and its surrounding
  grounds, study to be a wizard, learn Quidditch, collect objects to solve
  puzzles, become skilled at spells and potions, discover secret passages and
  locations, and interact with memorable characters from J.K. Rowling's
  magical world.

  Features
  ~~~~~~~~
  * Harry Potter's first adventure comes to life on the PC.  
  * Fully navigable 3D environments.
  * Stealth-based gameplay allows players to sneak around, avoiding
    unpleasant encounters and unwanted guests.
  * Interact with over twenty unforgettable characters from J.K. Rowling's
    magical world, including Ron Weasley, Hermione Granger, Nearly Headless
    Nick, and the mysterious Professor Snape.
  * Lead your house to victory in a fast-paced, arcade-style Quidditch match.  
  * Four key types of obstacles and challenges: physical obstacles,
    environmental puzzles, stealth objectives, and confrontations.  
  * Environments change as time passes. Stairs move and classrooms relocate.
  * Single-player game.  
  * Faithful representation of the magical world created in J.K. Rowling's
    best-selling novel.

                         [ I n s t a l l   N o t e s ]

   1.) Unzip/Unace (Ace 2.0) manually or use our installer
   2.) Extract setup.bat inside crack.ace to game dir.
   3.) Start setup.bat to decompress game-files.
   4.) Hit HP.exe in System folder to play the game!
   5.) Once in game go to options and set music to 0.

   Have fun!
